video.title: The X-Files
video.synopsis: FBI agents Scully, a skeptic, and Mulder, a believer, attempt to uncover a government conspiracy to hide evidence of extraterrestrial activity.

episodes.synopsis: Agent Dana Scully is instructed to debunk an FBI project dubbed "The X-Files," paranormal cases that have been reopened by agent Fox Mulder.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the mysterious case of a military test pilot who disappeared after experiencing strange psychotic behavior.
episodes.title: Deep Throat

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully search for a humanoid killer whose savage murder spree reoccurs every 30 years.
episodes.title: Squeeze

episodes.synopsis: Mulder becomes obsessed with solving a case that closely parallels an "encounter" he experienced as a child.
episodes.title: Conduit

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully track a legendary creature that has roamed the New Jersey countryside for over 40 years.
episodes.title: The Jersey Devil

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate the deaths of two men believed to have been killed by a powerful psychokinetic force.
episodes.title: Shadows

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, Mulder and Scully investigate the death of a corporate executive who may have been murdered by a thinking computer.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are sent to investigate when a team of geophysicists stationed at a remote Alaskan outpost is killed by a parasitic alien life form.
episodes.title: Ice

episodes.synopsis: When a space shuttle mission is sabotaged, Mulder suspects it may be the work of an alien spirit that inhabits the body of a former Gemini astronaut.
episodes.title: Space

episodes.synopsis: The future of the X-Files project is jeopardized after Mulder secretly infiltrates the government cover-up of a UFO crash.
episodes.title: Fallen Angel

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully search for two girls who disappeared after their fathers were murdered in an identical fashion.
episodes.title: Eve

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully join forces with an inspector from Scotland Yard when a man with pyrokinetic powers stalks members of the British aristocracy.
episodes.title: Fire

episodes.synopsis: Scully believes that the psychic predictions of a death row inmate are the only hope in apprehending a vicious murderer.
episodes.title: Beyond the Sea

episodes.synopsis: A religious sect member capable of changing gender becomes the prime suspect in a murder spree.
episodes.title: Gender Bender

episodes.synopsis: The consciousness of a dangerous criminal possesses an FBI agent who is also Scully's ex-boyfriend.
episodes.title: Lazarus

episodes.synopsis: A criminal believed to have died in prison years earlier wages a vendetta against Mulder.
episodes.title: Young at Heart

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully become the focus of a misinformation campaign when they attempt to trace the government's secret transport of an alien life form.
episodes.title: E.B.E.

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate a ministry led by a man whose son possesses the power to heal -- and to kill -- with a touch of his hand.
episodes.title: Miracle Man

episodes.synopsis: The agents track a wolflike creature linked to Native American legend.
episodes.title: Shapes

episodes.synopsis: A group of loggers working in a remote forest unearths thousands of deadly insectlike creatures that paralyze -- and then cocoon -- their victims.
episodes.title: Darkness Falls

episodes.synopsis: Eugene Tooms, a supernatural killer whom Mulder helped incarcerate, is released on parole.
episodes.title: Tooms

episodes.synopsis: An 8-year-old girl is the prime suspect in a series of bizarre, seemingly unrelated deaths.
episodes.title: Born Again

episodes.synopsis: When scientists at an aeronautics lab die under mysterious circumstances, the agents suspect a mentally challenged janitor may be the culprit.
episodes.title: Roland

episodes.synopsis: Deep Throat tips Mulder to a critically important case involving a missing fugitive and the cloning of extraterrestrial viruses.
episodes.title: The Erlenmeyer Flask

episodes.synopsis: Mulder travels to Puerto Rico in advance of a beret team out to destroy evidence of an extraterrestrial encounter.
episodes.title: Little Green Men

episodes.synopsis: Mulder pursues a humanoid, parasitic organism that uses sewage systems as its home.
episodes.title: The Host

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully investigate a series of violent killings committed by seemingly normal residents of a small town.
episodes.title: Blood

episodes.synopsis: Mulder searches for a Vietnam vet who can project his consciousness into other people's minds.
episodes.title: Sleepless

episodes.synopsis: A former FBI agent who claims he was abducted by aliens takes several people hostage.
episodes.title: Duane Barry

episodes.synopsis: Mulder attempts to rescue Scully after she is abducted by a deranged man who believes in UFOs.
episodes.title: Ascension

episodes.synopsis: Mulder links a series of grisly deaths to a group of modern-day vampires.
When Scully's comatose body is discovered at a local hospital, Mulder suspects the government was responsible for her disappearance.
episodes.title: One Breath

episodes.synopsis: A parasitic silicon-based life form is discovered by a team of scientists researching a volcano.
episodes.title: Firewalker

episodes.synopsis: Cattle ranchers in a remote Wisconsin town suspect a religious cult is to blame when local teenagers are drugged and abducted.
episodes.title: Red Museum

episodes.synopsis: A series of violent attacks at a convalescent home are linked to angry spirits from beyond the grave.
episodes.title: Excelsis Dei

episodes.synopsis: A pregnant woman experiences visions of serial killings that span half a century.
episodes.title: Aubrey

episodes.synopsis: Scully and Mulder hunt down a fetishist who collects pieces of the dead.
episodes.title: Irresistible

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate a murder in a small town populated by devil worshipers.
episodes.title: Die Hand die Verletzt

episodes.synopsis: Mulder suspects that a voodoo curse caused the deaths of two Marines stationed at a Haitian refugee camp.
episodes.title: Fresh Bones

episodes.synopsis: As Mulder searches for a killer capable of altering his shape, a woman who claims to be his long-lost sister suddenly appears.
episodes.title: Colony

episodes.synopsis: Mulder attempts to catch an alien bounty hunter who holds the key to his sister's whereabouts.
episodes.title: End Game

episodes.synopsis: Animals from a zoo in Idaho are suspected of killing several people, but witnesses claim the real culprit is a powerful invisible force.
episodes.title: Fearful Symmetry

episodes.synopsis: The agents become stranded aboard a ship where the human aging process is greatly accelerated.
episodes.title: Død Kalm

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for a killer in a Florida town inhabited by sideshow performers.
episodes.title: Humbug

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate when a young boy's family is plagued by several tragic accidents.
episodes.title: The Calusari

episodes.synopsis: As Scully investigates the spread of a deadly contagion at a prison, Mulder tracks down two escaped convicts infected with the disease.
episodes.title: F. Emasculata

episodes.synopsis: The agents hunt down a scientist who is literally afraid of his own shadow.
episodes.title: Soft Light

episodes.synopsis: A meat processing plant comes under scrutiny after several people mysteriously disappear from a small town.
episodes.title: Our Town

episodes.synopsis: Mulder receives an encrypted computer disk containing the defense department's top secret files on extraterrestrial life.
episodes.title: Anasazi

episodes.synopsis: As Scully faces possible dismissal from the FBI, a manhunt ensues for the missing agent Mulder.
episodes.title: The Blessing Way

episodes.synopsis: As a government hit squad closes in on the agents, Mulder searches for clues about his father's involvement in a secret project.
episodes.title: Paper Clip

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate the deaths of several young people who were apparently struck by lightning in the same small town.
episodes.title: D.P.O.

episodes.synopsis: A man with psychic powers assists the agents with the hunt for a killer.
episodes.title: Clyde Bruckman's Final Repose

episodes.synopsis: Enemies of a prison inmate who was executed in the electric chair begin dying one by one.
episodes.title: The List

episodes.synopsis: The agents hunt for a killer who uses the Internet to attract his victims.
episodes.title: 2Shy

episodes.synopsis: A quadruple amputee becomes the prime suspect in a series of bizarre deaths.
episodes.title: The Walk

episodes.synopsis: A woman experiences a psychic connection with a teenager held captive by a deranged man.
episodes.title: Oubliette

episodes.synopsis: An "alien autopsy" videotape and a murder spark Mulder's search for a strange creature. Scully looks for information about her disappearance.
episodes.title: Nisei

episodes.synopsis: Mulder becomes trapped aboard a train rigged with an explosive device. Scully searches for the truth behind the government's secret experiments.
Scully attempts to protect a boy whose death could trigger the coming of Armageddon.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: The agents come to the aid of a town seemingly under attack by killer cockroaches.
episodes.title: War of the Coprophages

episodes.synopsis: A rare alignment of the planets gives two teenage girls dangerous telekinetic powers.
episodes.title: Syzygy

episodes.synopsis: Mulder becomes obsessed with a case involving an incarcerated serial killer who claims he was possessed by a gargoyle.
episodes.title: Grotesque

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate the mystery surrounding a sunken World War II aircraft.
episodes.title: Piper Maru

episodes.synopsis: Mulder uncovers clues about a cover-up involving an alien entity and a sunken World War II aircraft. Scully pursues the man who murdered her sister.
episodes.title: Apocrypha

episodes.synopsis: The agents play a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a killer who can control people's minds.
episodes.title: Pusher

episodes.synopsis: A curse befalls members of an archaeological team after a sacred urn is excavated in South America and transported to a Boston museum.
episodes.title: Teso dos Bichos

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate a deadly game in San Francisco's Chinatown district.
episodes.title: Hell Money

episodes.synopsis: Scully recounts the investigation of an alleged UFO encounter for a famous author researching his latest novel.
episodes.title: Jose Chung's 'From Outer Space'

episodes.synopsis: Skinner becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a prostitute.
episodes.title: Avatar

episodes.synopsis: Mulder suspects that a beast similar to the Loch Ness Monster is responsible for the deaths of several people who reside near a large lake.
episodes.title: Quagmire

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate a series of murders linked to a device that alters television signals.
episodes.title: Wetwired

episodes.synopsis: After his mother suffers a stroke, Mulder searches for an alien being who possesses miraculous healing powers.
episodes.title: Talitha Cumi

episodes.synopsis: As the alien bounty hunter continues his relentless pursuit, Mulder encounters puzzling new evidence regarding his sister.
episodes.title: Herrenvolk

episodes.synopsis: The agents encounter a family of inbred, animal-like brothers living on a farm in a remote section of Pennsylvania.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Mulder believes a creature from an African folktale may be responsible for the disappearance of several black men in the Philadelphia area.
episodes.title: Teliko

episodes.synopsis: The agents hunt for a kidnapper whose mind's eye is captured on film.
episodes.title: Unruhe

episodes.synopsis: Mulder believes a woman with multiple personalities is the reincarnation of a lover from another life, and uses her to help to disarm a cult leader.
episodes.title: The Field Where I Died

episodes.synopsis: Patients undergoing cosmetic surgery die horrible deaths at the hands of doctors possessed by witchcraft.
episodes.title: Sanguinarium

episodes.synopsis: A Lone Gunmen member is targeted for extermination after he uncovers information linking the Cancer Man to several assassinations.
episodes.title: Musings of a Cigarette Smoking Man

episodes.synopsis: A tip from Krycek leads Mulder and Scully to a Martian meteorite fragment   containing an alien life form.
episodes.title: Tunguska

episodes.synopsis: Mulder escapes from a Russian prison camp. Scully is jailed after she refuses to cooperate with a Senate subcommittee hearing.
episodes.title: Terma

episodes.synopsis: An incarcerated serial killer claims Mulder's sister was one of his many victims.
episodes.title: Paper Hearts

episodes.synopsis: A community of migrant workers attributes several strange deaths to El  Chupacabra -- a creature straight out of Mexican folklore.
episodes.title: El Mundo Gira

episodes.synopsis: A headless corpse walks out of a hospital morgue, triggering the search for a humanoid life form that possesses unimaginable regenerative powers.
episodes.title: Leonard Betts

episodes.synopsis: While Mulder is vacationing, Scully finds herself attracted to a handsome divorcee whose Bettie Page-like tattoo seemingly has a mind of its own.
episodes.title: Never Again

episodes.synopsis: When Scully is diagnosed with cancer, Mulder hunts for research files pertaining to a group of female abductees who also contracted the disease.
episodes.title: Memento Mori

episodes.synopsis: Mulder suspects that a golem, a monster described in Jewish folklore, may be responsible for the deaths of several people who murdered a Jewish man.
episodes.title: Kaddish

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly invisible Vietnam vet begins killing the military's top brass.
episodes.title: Unrequited

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate the apparent downing of a commercial jetliner by a UFO.
episodes.title: Tempus Fugit

episodes.synopsis: Mulder is placed under military arrest after he discovers the existence of a UFO crash site. Scully mourns the loss of a fellow agent.
episodes.title: Max

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for answers when an elderly man uses a technology of the future to commit murder.
episodes.title: Synchrony

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for a man who possesses the ability to change form.
episodes.title: Small Potatoes

episodes.synopsis: Skinner is framed for murder after he covers up the death of a young woman who  was attacked by a swarm of bees.
episodes.title: Zero Sum

episodes.synopsis: The agents suspect a mentally disturbed man is connected to the deaths of several girls whose spirits attempted to make contact with the living.
episodes.title: Elegy

episodes.synopsis: Mulder becomes the prime suspect in an apparent double homicide.
episodes.title: Demons

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully search for the truth when an anthropologist discovers what could be the frozen remains of extraterrestrial life.
episodes.title: Gethsemane

episodes.synopsis: Mulder accesses a facility that may hold a cure for Scully's illness. Scully performs an experiment in hopes of determining the origin of the disease.
episodes.title: Redux: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Scully is hospitalized after collapsing. Mulder receives help from a most unlikely source as he continues his search for a cure for Scully's illness.
episodes.title: Redux: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In 1989, the Lone Gunmen meet for the first time when they assist a woman who claims the government plans to use civilians in a secret experiment.
episodes.title: Unusual Suspects

episodes.synopsis: Agents Stonecypher and Kinsley accompany Mulder and Scully to investigate the disappearances of several people in a remote region of Florida.
episodes.title: Detour

episodes.synopsis: Townspeople in rural Indiana believe a local legend that a Frankenstein-like creature roams the countryside. Mulder and Scully arrive to investigate.
episodes.title: The Post-Modern Prometheus

episodes.synopsis: Scully suspects a 3-year-old girl is the daughter of her sister, Melissa. Yet DNA tests reveal the girl's origins are even more surprising.
episodes.title: Christmas Carol

episodes.synopsis: Scully and Mulder search for a cure for Emily's illness, as two shapeshifters appear to be involved with prolonging her worsening condition.
episodes.title: Emily

episodes.synopsis: An escaped prisoner capable of mind control is loose. Mulder thinks he may be innocent, but Scully believes Mulder is under the criminal's spell.
episodes.title: Kitsunegari

episodes.synopsis: A teenager becomes the prime suspect in his stepfather's murder. Yet it appears the Michigan wilderness may have been the boy's accomplice.
episodes.title: Schizogeny

episodes.synopsis: Residents of a coastal town in Maine are terrorized by a little girl and her doll, Chinga, who bring harm to anyone who upsets them.
episodes.title: Chinga

episodes.synopsis: A sentient computer program begins targeting its creators. Mulder and Scully track down the rogue system with the help of a young woman.
episodes.title: Kill Switch

episodes.synopsis: The agents recount their versions of events that led to the killing of a teenager suspected of being a vampire.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Scully and Mulder search for answers when UFO abductees are burned alive. The agents meet a woman who shares similar symptoms with Scully.
episodes.title: Patient X

episodes.synopsis: Scully undergoes hypnosis. Cassandra is believed to have been abducted, while Krycek reveals information about a captured alien.
episodes.title: The Red and the Black

episodes.synopsis: In the 1950s, two FBI agents investigate a series of mysterious and gruesome deaths that are somehow linked to Mulder's father.
episodes.title: Travelers

episodes.synopsis: Mulder suspects a blind woman can see through the eyes of a killer, but the blind woman may be withholding details about her own involvement.
episodes.title: Mind's Eye

episodes.synopsis: When a handicapped girl dies a mysterious death, Mulder and Scully discover more girls' lives are at stake, in a divine battle between good and evil.
episodes.title: All Souls

episodes.synopsis: Mulder goes undercover to infiltrate a militia group armed with a deadly pathogen. Can Mulder stop the militia's plan for a massive attack?
episodes.title: The Pine Bluff Variant

episodes.synopsis: Mulder is taken hostage by a man who claims his boss is a monster and his co-workers are a legion of the undead. Outrageous claims ... or are they?
episodes.title: Folie a Deux

episodes.synopsis: A 12-year-old chess master may hold the key to unlocking the mysteries of the X-Files, however, a powerful syndicate is plotting to kill the boy.
episodes.title: The End

episodes.synopsis: Get a behind-the-scenes glimpse of this hit sci-fi series with this documentary special that includes interviews, bloopers, and more.
episodes.title: Inside the X-Files

episodes.synopsis: As a review panel probes Mulder's claims regarding aliens and a government conspiracy, Mulder and Scully hunt down a deadly extraterrestrial creature.
episodes.title: The Beginning

episodes.synopsis: A man infected with a deadly pathogen climbs into Mulder's car and tells him to keep the vehicle moving. Scully attempts to produce an antidote.
episodes.title: Drive

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a ship, a time warp in the Bermuda Triangle traps Mulder aboard a 1939 luxury liner filled with Nazis.
episodes.title: Triangle

episodes.synopsis: A bizarre occurrence at Area 51 swaps Mulder's consciousness with that of a stranger, who has a wealth of information about the top secret base.
episodes.title: Dreamland: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Scully searches for a way to reverse Mulder and Fletcher's identity swap. Fletcher, meanwhile, discovers the identity of Mulder's informant.
episodes.title: Dreamland: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: On Christmas Eve, Mulder and Scully find themselves in a haunted house with two ghosts who are determined to prove just how lonely yuletide can be.
episodes.title: How the Ghosts Stole Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Mulder takes on a case in Virginia, and winds up pursuing a man whom he believes is actually a demon bent on fathering a child.
episodes.title: Terms of Endearment

episodes.synopsis: When a series of strange meteorological events occur in Kansas, Mulder and Scully investigate a man who claims he can control the weather.
episodes.title: The Rain King

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully try to track down a suspect and a cure when Skinner is infected with a disease and is warned that his life will end in 24 hours.
episodes.title: S.R. 819

episodes.synopsis: Scully pursues a photographer who can seemingly predict the deaths of other people in time to capture them on film.
episodes.title: Tithonus

episodes.synopsis: When Cassandra Spender returns after her disappearance at the mass burning site, she tells Mulder details about aliens on Earth and the black ooze.
episodes.title: Two Fathers

episodes.synopsis: As Syndicate members debate whether to cooperate with the aliens in the colonization of Earth, Mulder and Scully attempt to prevent an invasion.
episodes.title: One Son

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully search for a sea monster that Arthur Dales believes is responsible for the disappearance of a couple and their son.
episodes.title: Agua Mala

episodes.synopsis: Involved in a bank robbery with a man who is armed with explosives, Mulder and Scully help a woman who is forced to relive the day again and again.
episodes.title: Monday

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully go undercover at a planned community in San Diego, where an investigation into a series of deaths has been hampered by a conspiracy.
episodes.title: Arcadia

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully consult an animal behaviorist in their hunt for a wild dog that escaped from a freighter's cargo hold en route to the United States.
episodes.title: Alpha

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Scully pursue a dangerous escaped convict who is capable of passing through solid matter, as the man tracks down his former lover.
episodes.title: Trevor

episodes.synopsis: A writer who lives next door to Mulder is the prime suspect in a series of killings in which each victim had their heart removed from their body.
episodes.title: Milagro

episodes.synopsis: Arthur Dales's brother recounts a tale about an alien baseball player who hid amongst an all-African-American team, during the 1940s.
episodes.title: The Unnatural

episodes.synopsis: The Lone Gunmen attend a defense contractors' conference to ascertain information about the industry by infiltrating its inner sphere.
episodes.title: Three of a Kind

episodes.synopsis: A murder involving the goo-covered skeletons of two missing hikers leads Mulder and Scully on a journey in which nothing is quite as it seems.
episodes.title: Field Trip

episodes.synopsis: Mulder believes that metallic objects discovered in Africa are proof that life originated elsewhere in the universe.
episodes.title: Biogenesis

episodes.synopsis: Scully attempts to decipher the strange symbols covering a submerged spacecraft in hopes of finding a cure to Mulder's affliction.
episodes.title: The Sixth Extinction: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Scully searches for Mulder after the Cigarette Smoking Man takes him from a hospital for purposes unknown.
episodes.title: The Sixth Extinction: Part 2: Amor Fati

episodes.synopsis: The agents attempt to link a grisly murder to a fast-food restaurant employee with a most unusual eating disorder.
episodes.title: Hungry

episodes.synopsis: As the year 2000 approaches, the agents seek out ex-Millennium Group member Frank Black when some of his former associates turn into the walking dead.
episodes.title: Millennium

episodes.synopsis: The agents encounter a group of teenagers who somehow move faster than the eye can see.
episodes.title: Rush

episodes.synopsis: The agents encounter a man who may just be the luckiest person in the world.
episodes.title: The Goldberg Variation

episodes.synopsis: A reverend helps a death fetishist -- who once terrorized Scully -- escape from prison.
episodes.title: Orison

episodes.synopsis: The agents attempt to solve a mystery involving a magician who literally lost his head.
episodes.title: The Amazing Maleeni

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate when a man, connected to a church that uses deadly snakes to test the righteousness of its members, dies from snake bites.
episodes.title: Signs & Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Mulder experiences a tragic loss in his personal life as he investigates a young girl's disappearance.
episodes.title: Sein und Zeit

episodes.synopsis: With the help of a police psychic, Mulder searches for his missing sister.
episodes.title: Closure

episodes.synopsis: A camera crew from the television series "COPS" follows the agents as they attempt to catch a mysterious creature terrorizing Los Angeles.
episodes.title: X-COPS

episodes.synopsis: The agents find themselves trapped inside a computer game dominated by an extremely sexy -- and deadly -- virtual character.
episodes.title: First Person Shooter

episodes.synopsis: When a medical doctor's family falls victim to rare diseases, Mulder suspects it may be the handiwork of someone familiar with hexes.
episodes.title: Theef

episodes.synopsis: Scully accompanies the Cigarette Smoking Man on a journey to meet a scientist who possesses the cure to cancer.
episodes.title: En Ami

episodes.synopsis: During the Easter holiday, Mulder investigates a series of deaths involving the appearance of ravens, broken mirrors and a murderous creature.
episodes.title: Chimera

episodes.synopsis: Scully embraces an alternative approach to healing as she attempts to save the life of a former lover.
episodes.title: All Things

episodes.synopsis: Mulder falls victim to a deadly insect linked to a tobacco company's research lab.
episodes.title: Brand X

episodes.synopsis: A screenwriter tags along with the agents as they investigate a church bombing -- a case that is later transformed into a Hollywood film.
episodes.title: Hollywood A.D.

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for two nearly identical women who trigger destruction whenever they meet.
episodes.title: Fight Club

episodes.synopsis: A man without a mouth and an invisible corpse lead the agents to a genie who grants Mulder three wishes.
episodes.title: Je Souhaite

episodes.synopsis: Returning to the scene of their first investigation seven years ago, Mulder and Scully encounter a UFO that may spell the end of their partnership.
episodes.title: Requiem

episodes.synopsis: Agent Doggett heads a manhunt to locate the missing Mulder. Scully and Skinner use information supplied by the Lone Gunmen to find their colleague.
episodes.title: Within

episodes.synopsis: Scully, Skinner and Doggett encounter the alien bounty hunter, who uses his shapeshifting abilities to fool the FBI as he attempts to destroy the boy.
episodes.title: Without

episodes.synopsis: Scully and Doggett investigate several killings involving a terrifying bat-like creature.
episodes.title: Patience

episodes.synopsis: Scully finds herself trapped in a desolate area where townspeople seemingly worship a hitchhiker.
episodes.title: Roadrunners

episodes.synopsis: A little boy who vanished 10 years earlier suddenly reappears ... but has not aged a day.
episodes.title: Invocation

episodes.synopsis: A man accused of murdering his wife realizes he's been given a second chance at correcting past mistakes.
episodes.title: Redrum

episodes.synopsis: Doggett investigates a cult leader's seeming ability to project himself into his victim's dreams. And Scully checks into a hospital.
episodes.title: Via Negativa

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for a killer who seemingly possesses the ability to see through walls.
episodes.title: Surekill

episodes.synopsis: Scully and Doggett track a metallic man bent on killing those responsible for his condition.
episodes.title: Salvage

episodes.synopsis: The agents pursue an Indian mystic who can manipulate the human mind.
episodes.title: Badlaa

episodes.synopsis: Doggett seeks to solve a mystery involving Mulder and a legendary creature linked to Native American lore.
episodes.title: The Gift

episodes.synopsis: With the clock ticking, Doggett and a team of experts attempt to solve the mystery behind strange deaths in a Boston subway tunnel.
episodes.title: Medusa

episodes.synopsis: Scully fears that she and another pregnant woman will give birth to alien babies.
episodes.title: Per Manum

episodes.synopsis: Joined by FBI Agent Monica Reyes, Scully, Doggett and Skinner search for Jeremiah Smith after a UFO deposits the bodies of ailing abductees on Earth.
episodes.title: This is Not Happening

episodes.synopsis: After Mulder is put to rest, the body of an alien abductee comes back to life, giving Scully and Skinner cause for hope.
episodes.title: Deadalive

episodes.synopsis: A U.S. census worker warns the White House about an alien invasion which sparks Mulder's quest to access data at an information processing complex.
episodes.title: Three Words

episodes.synopsis: The agents search for a man who may have been connected with the death of Doggett's son years earlier ... a man who may be possessed by evil itself.
episodes.title: Empedocles

episodes.synopsis: Mulder and Doggett become trapped on an oil rig manned by crewmen infected with the mysterious black oil virus.
episodes.title: Vienen

episodes.synopsis: Mulder searches for Doggett and his new partner after they are trapped with a deadly reptilian monster.
episodes.title: Alone

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly unstoppable Billy Miles begins killing scientists performing genetic research -- then targets Scully.
episodes.title: Essence

episodes.synopsis: Mulder searches for answers when a connection is made between Billy Miles and members of the FBI. Scully prepares to give birth in a remote location.
episodes.title: Existence

episodes.synopsis: A surveillance tape threatens to derail Doggett's investigation while a woman with the ability to remain submerged underwater infiltrates the FBI.
episodes.title: Nothing Important Happened Today: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Doggett continues his investigation, he attempts to uncover the truth about a woman with superhuman abilities who may or may not be aiding him.
episodes.title: Nothing Important Happened Today: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The agents attempt to find a link between a mental patient and several bizarre satanic murders.
episodes.title: Daemonicus

episodes.synopsis: Agent Reyes theorizes that a maniacal killer who critically wounded Doggett may have entered the world from a parallel dimension.
episodes.title: 4-D

episodes.synopsis: The agents investigate the murder of a teenager who died after insects devoured his brain.
episodes.title: Lord of the Flies

episodes.synopsis: A couple believes their infant possesses the same unworldly qualities as baby William. A shadowy operative convinces Scully to contact Mulder.
episodes.title: Trust No 1

episodes.synopsis: Agent Doggett awakens in a corrupt and violent Mexican town with no memory of his true identity.
episodes.title: John Doe

episodes.synopsis: Reyes senses she somehow played a role in a series of grisly murders dating back more than a century -- in which the victims were all skinned alive.
episodes.title: Hellbound

episodes.synopsis: When a religious cult unearths a spacecraft similar to the one Scully discovered previously, a plot is set in motion to kill baby William.
episodes.title: Provenance

episodes.synopsis: As Scully searches for her son, cult members make preparations to access a spaceship that they believe houses a physical manifestation of God.
episodes.title: Providence

episodes.synopsis: When Agent Reyes is injured in a car accident, she finds herself trapped in a netherworld between life and death.
episodes.title: Audrey Pauley

episodes.synopsis: When DNA evidence exonerates a murderer who Doggett had incarcerated, Doggett desperately tries to put the man back in jail before he strikes again.
episodes.title: Underneath

episodes.synopsis: When Reyes uses numerology to connect the murders of several women, she and Scully become trapped with a mysterious man who could be the killer.
episodes.title: Improbable

episodes.synopsis: A little boy appears to be at the center of mysterious and deadly happenings involving creatures that seemingly take refuge inside the human body.
episodes.title: Scary Monsters

episodes.synopsis: When Morris Fletcher claims to know the identity of a supersoldier, Reyes and Doggett turn to the Lone Gunmen to find their old friend Harlow.
episodes.title: Jump the Shark

episodes.synopsis: The agents detain a horrifically scarred man caught breaking into the X-Files office... a man Doggett believes is Fox Mulder.
episodes.title: William

episodes.synopsis: An FBI cadet with uncanny instincts for solving crimes sheds new light on the unsolved murder of Doggett's son.
episodes.title: Release

episodes.synopsis: The agents attempt to connect the dots when a series of deaths are linked to a man who lives in a house that resembles the home of "The Brady Bunch."
episodes.title: Sunshine Days

episodes.synopsis: The U.S. military puts Mulder on trial and hears testimony supporting Mulder's claim regarding the existence of extraterrestrial life.
episodes.title: The Truth
